title: Help my game wont open I clicked it and nothing pops up?

replies.body:
[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

This is a great suggestion. Because League interacts with a lot of files both inside and outside of the League installation folder, along with different software packages, it's important the client has proper System permissions. This guide will go over the most common factors to ensuring the client can run properly. 

Should you still have issues after going through the steps in the guide, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) It will also greatly help out the support agent if you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)
